thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Amazon Is Taking Over the Stock Market, Too

author: Akane Otani
title: Amazon Is Taking Over the Stock Market, Too
text:
Three technology titans have powered nearly half of the S&P 500’s advance this year, a worrying sign for investors who expected tech’s dominance to give way to cyclical sectors, like materials or industrials, as the economy improved.
Amazon.com Inc., whose shares have soared 28% so far this year, has accounted for 27% of the broader index’s 1.6% gain through Tuesday, according to S&P Dow Jones Indices’ data. That is followed by Microsoft Corp., which has contributed 13%, and Netflix Inc. at 8.3%.
...
